hero.description: Valisa Cloud empowers businesses across Europe, Türkiye and Asia with best-in-class cloud solutions — AWS, Azure, Google Cloud, Alibaba Cloud and Huawei Cloud — all with exclusive partner discounts.
partners.label: Authorized Partner of Leading Cloud Platforms
services.label: What We Do
services.title: Comprehensive Cloud Services
services.subtitle: From cloud reselling to fully managed operations, we provide end-to-end solutions that drive your business forward.
services.cloud.title: Ubiquitous Cloud Services
services.cloud.desc: Access AWS, Azure, Google Cloud, Alibaba Cloud and Huawei Cloud through a single partner — with significant cost savings through our volume discounts and committed-use agreements.
services.cloud.f1: Up to 30% savings on cloud spend
services.consult.title: Cloud Consultancy
services.consult.desc: Our certified architects and consultants help you choose the right cloud strategy — whether multi-cloud, hybrid or single-platform — tailored to your business goals and compliance requirements.
services.migration.title: Migration Services
services.migration.desc: Seamlessly migrate your workloads to the cloud or between cloud platforms with zero downtime. Our proven migration framework minimizes risk and maximizes performance.
services.dev.title: Customized Development
services.dev.desc: Build cloud-native applications, APIs and integrations that leverage the best of multi-cloud. Our engineering teams deliver scalable, secure solutions tailored to your needs.
services.managed.title: Managed Services
services.managed.desc: Let us handle the day-to-day operations of your cloud infrastructure. Our 24/7 managed services team ensures optimal performance, security and availability.
why.label: Why Valisa Cloud
why.title: Built for the Global Enterprise
why.subtitle: We combine deep multi-cloud expertise with regional knowledge to deliver unmatched value to our customers.
why.multicloud.title: Multi-Cloud Expertise
why.multicloud.desc: Vendor-agnostic guidance across all 5 major cloud platforms ensures you choose the right fit for every workload.
why.security.title: Enterprise Security
why.security.desc: GDPR-compliant, ISO-certified operations with end-to-end encryption and zero-trust architecture.
why.multilingual.title: Multilingual Support
why.multilingual.desc: Native-speaking teams in English, German, Turkish, and Chinese deliver regional expertise with a personal touch.
why.savings.title: Significant Savings
why.savings.desc: Our partner-level agreements translate into substantial discounts on cloud services, passed directly to you.
regions.label: Markets We Serve
regions.title: Bridging Continents with Cloud
regions.subtitle: Strategically positioned to serve enterprises across Europe, Türkiye and Chinese businesses expanding globally.
regions.europe.title: European Customers
regions.europe.desc: Serving enterprises across the EU with GDPR-compliant cloud solutions. We understand European regulatory frameworks and deliver localized support across major markets including Germany, France, the Netherlands and the Nordics.
regions.turkiye.title: Türkiye Customers
regions.turkiye.desc: Dedicated local team supporting Turkish enterprises with cloud adoption, digital transformation and compliance with Turkish data regulations. Native Turkish-speaking engineers and consultants.
regions.china.title: Chinese Go-Global Customers
regions.china.desc: Helping Chinese enterprises expand internationally with multi-cloud infrastructure across global regions. Bridging Chinese cloud ecosystems (Alibaba & Huawei) with Western platforms for seamless global operations.
solutions.label: Solutions
solutions.title: Tailored Solutions for Every Stage
solutions.subtitle: Whether you're starting your cloud journey or optimizing a complex multi-cloud environment, we have a solution for you.
solutions.start.title: Cloud Start
solutions.start.desc: Get started with cloud services at preferential rates, with guided onboarding and basic support.
solutions.pro.title: Cloud Professional
solutions.pro.desc: Multi-cloud management with consulting, migration support and proactive monitoring included.
solutions.ent.title: Cloud Enterprise
solutions.ent.desc: Fully customized cloud solutions with dedicated teams, custom development and SLA guarantees.
contact.label: Contact Us
contact.title: Let's Build Your Cloud Strategy
contact.subtitle: Ready to optimize your cloud infrastructure? Get in touch and our team will respond within 24 hours.
contact.heading: We'd Love to Hear from You
contact.desc: Whether you're looking for cloud cost optimization, planning a migration, or need a fully managed solution — our experts are ready to help.
contact.email.label: Email
contact.phone.label: Phone
contact.office.label: Office
contact.form.placeholder.message: Tell us about your project or requirements...
footer.brand: Your trusted multi-cloud partner for Europe, Türkiye and Chinese go-global enterprises. We bridge cloud platforms and continents.
